name: BatWave
description:
Game made during the Global Game Jam 2017 at Epitech Toulouse (France).
The subject was : "Waves". We went for the sound aspect with a bat looking for food for its little bats, avoiding the owls hunting it. Use arrows to move, LeftControl to drop your items and Space to see collisions and enemies with your soundwave ability ! 
Game made as a team of five : two developpers, one sound designer, one 2D artist and one 3D artist. 
I was part of the game design and made all 3D assets. 
Event link : http://globalgamejam.org/2017/games/batwave 
Thanks to Solenn Albiol, our 2D Artist, for the gameplay footage ! :)
